result.eng: Immigrants usually don't speak good English.
result.ga: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircigh
result.orig: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircigh
result.html: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircighImmigrants usually don't speak good English.
result.ponchtml: Ní gnáċ Béarla maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag inimirciġImmigrants usually don't speak good English.

result.eng: Immigrants do not have the same rights as citizens.
result.ga: Níl na cearta céanna ag na hinimircigh agus atá ag na saoránaigh
result.orig: Níl na cearta céanna ag na hinimircigh agus atá ag na saoránaigh
result.html: Níl na cearta céanna ag na hinimircigh agus atá ag na saoránaighImmigrants do not have the same rights as citizens.
result.ponchtml: Níl na cearta céanna ag na hinimirciġ agus atá ag na saoránaiġImmigrants do not have the same rights as citizens.
